data.actual_result: The edit message bar comes with you to the other server.
data.expected_result: The Edit message bar disappears until you go back into the server you started editing a message in
data.short_description: Opening another server while Editing a message still keeps the edit message bar(Trying to send a message while having it will do nothing but remove it).
data.steps_to_repro: - Edit a message - Slide to the left and open another server.
